plugin.name: hyperlink_url_lua
plugin.author: Nick Gammon, Ruthgul
plugin.purpose: Makes a URL on a line into a hyperlink
plugin.description:
.---------------------. | hyperlink_url_lua | `---------------------'
Detects URLs and makes them into hyperlinks.
This plugin is based on Nick Gammon's Hyperlink_URL plugin (id = "eb9ea32827509752b18f9d70").
Limitations: * Only detects one URL per line.
Authors: Nick Gammon, Ruthgul (maintained by Ruthgul)
Changes added by Ruthgul: - added support for mailto:, https:// and ftp:// URLs, as proposed in https://www.mushclient.com/forum/?id=3018. - now uses style runs (to preserve colors)
Latest version: http://github.com/MateriaMagicaLLC/mm-mushclient-scripts

muclient.triggers: <trigger enabled="y" keep_evaluating="y" regexp="y" match="^(.*)(?(ftp|mailto|https?)\:(|\/\/)([^ ^\,\;\'])+)(.*)$" omit_from_output="y" sequence="100" script="on_hyperlink" >
muclient.script:
----------------- -- plugin stuff -----------------
function OnPluginInstall() Tell("-- " .. GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 1) .. ": type ") ColourTell("silver", "black", GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 1) .. " help") Note(" to see info about this plugin --") end
function OnHelp() ColourNote("silver", "black", world.GetPluginInfo(world.GetPluginID(), 3)) Note("") ColourNote("silver", "black", "(this version: " .. os.date("%c", GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 14)) .. ")") end
function plugin_update_url() local t = { "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MateriaMagicaLLC/mm-mushclient-scripts/master/src/hyperlink_url_lua.xml", } return (table.concat(t, ";")) end
-------------------- -- hyperlink stuff --------------------
function on_hyperlink(name, line, wildcards, styles) local url = wildcards.url for _, val in ipairs(styles) do show_style_run(val, url) end Note("") end
function show_style_run(val, url) local fgcol = RGBColourToName(val.textcolour) local bgcol = RGBColourToName(val.backcolour) local text = val.text
st, en = string.find(text, escape_literal(url)) if (st) then -- the style run contains an URL ColourTell(fgcol, bgcol, text:sub(1, st - 1)) Hyperlink(url, url, "browse: " .. url, fgcol, bgcol, true) ColourTell(fgcol, bgcol, text:sub(en + 1, text:len()))
else -- the style run doesn't contain an URL ColourTell(fgcol, bgcol, text) end end
function escape_literal(url) return url :gsub('%%', '%%%%') :gsub('^%^', '%%^') :gsub('%$$', '%%$') :gsub('%(', '%%(') :gsub('%)', '%%)') :gsub('%.', '%%.') :gsub('%[', '%%[') :gsub('%]', '%%]') :gsub('%*', '%%*') :gsub('%+', '%%+') :gsub('%-', '%%-') :gsub('%?', '%%?') end
